name: IT 201 Sprint 3 (se283)
description:
NJIT IT 201-008, Spring 2021

Sprint 3

Instructions: Right-click and hold to pain objects, which will appear on the screen for 2 seconds.  Use the keys "R", "S", and "A" to change the animation states of the animated Wheel prefab between rotation, scaling, and animation (combined) respectively. Use the dropdown menu to change the color of the Wheel's hub. Use the "1" and "2" keys to respectively show and hide the dropdown menu.
